Reviews.Title: “Just okay...”
Reviews.Author: Tap49Dancer
Reviews.Content: My group stayed here for a couple of nights for a business trip. The room was quiet and clean, but nothing fancy. Just beds, a lamp, a dresser and a small TV. No wash cloths or face towels are provided - only large towels. Was a little alarmed that there was no deadbolt or chain on the door. I asked the lady at the front desk about this, and she stated that none of the rooms had security chains. I didn't really mind the fact that I had to borrow a hair dryer and iron from the front desk. I also didn't really mind wearing that "mandatory" paper security bracelet. My problem was that I had NO HOT WATER either night. The woman at the front desk told me to let the water run for 10 minutes at a low volume, and then increase it to full volume. Didn't work! Besides, why should a paying customer even have to tinker with the plumbing in the hopes of getting hot water. It should just work. For $30 more dollars a night I could have been at a resort 20 minutes away. I thought about checking out after the first night, but I was with a group and this hotel was very convenient to the site that we were visiting. Also, as someone mentioned, they charge your credit card in full at check-in. I had a strong feeling that I would be given the runaround if I asked for a refund. My stay here was not bad, but not really good... it was just okay. Tolerable. Wouldn't stay here again unless nothing better was available. Live and learn.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place!”
Reviews.Author: CRtravelerDenver_CO
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a couple of nights. The beds are hard but the rooms are clean, shower worked well. Great location to walk to the beach and downtown Boqueron. We stayed here for the Three Kings Holiday and that's a wild party! It's located just as you come into town so your not right in the middle of town. That keeps the noise down. The staff was awesome! We were on the 4th floor which had a nice view. A small refrigerator is in the room.

Reviews.Title: “No thank you”
Reviews.Author: Cheskilyn
Reviews.Content: They didn't have king size beds available but they didn't say anything found out when I fot to the room. The toilet was damaged so ee had to ask for another room. When we got to the other room the fridge didn't work and there wasn't any hor water. Bad experience after another.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in BoquerÃ³n!!!”
Reviews.Author: Frida03
Reviews.Content: Excellent location, walking distance to the beach and to the "poblado". Great pool area and the rooms were very nice!!!

Reviews.Title: “Horror!”
Reviews.Author: Coever
Reviews.Content: Not a nice place to stay at all! Rooms were not clean, there was a plastic knife between our sheets, sheets looked dirty (even the clean ones we got from the front desk). Unexpierenced staff gave us a room (no windows) with one bed even though she saw three persons standing in front of her desk. We paid 150 dollars, for 20 dollars more you can stay in for example the Hilton Caribe! So if you have the chance to drive further I would certainly do!

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN...”
Reviews.Author: ingridjohanna
Reviews.Content: We checked in and within 15 minutes checked out. The bathroon was FILTHY, the rooms were not what I expected, the pool is so close to the street that there is NO privacy at all. At the front desk they sell mosquito repellant bracelets, so use your imagination on that one. I'd recommend it for Frat parties NOT for families.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and clean, good service.”
Reviews.Author: traviesa694
Reviews.Content: The king size bed was very comfortable, the A/C worked just fine, very good service. The pool was Ok but not the best. The room was always nice and clean. Good location. Good prices.

Reviews.Title: “Not again”
Reviews.Author: lygiat
Reviews.Content: I stayed again in this hotel after a past not so pleasant stay because of its proximity to the beach ,The door had no security lock any one can open it very easily.No security boxes to leave our things(jewelry etc. The bathrooms are old and look dirty .I almost fall in the slimy floor so i decided to put a towel in the floor. The curtains are so flimsy that you wake up at 5:30 AM when the sun comes out. My friend left 2 gold chains in the room while we went to the beach to prevent losing them and guess what they disappear from the room and when we complain they even told us that we were liars. I have travelled all over the world and I have never stayed in a hotel wher I felt so insecure when i went to sleep. Ah the food was so salty that I could not eat it and all they said was we are sorry .We had to pay for it .

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay here if I had a choice”
Reviews.Author: Angelique0706
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this property for two nights because a friend was getting married and this was the guest hotel. My only complaint, the accomodations. The hotel seemed clean, but the room furnishings/decorations were sparce. The balcony chairs were dirty, air conditioning loud, hot water non-existent and the shower, although I believe it was clean, looked dirty. Not sure how you can possibly sanitize a tile floor in a shower. I only got 13 channels of "cable" of which 6 were English and none of them network stations or even cable news stations. None of the refrigerators are plugged in; so expect to plug in your refrigerator and give it time to cool when you check-in. I was given one hand towel on my first night. The next day there were no face or hand towels, only body towels. When I asked for hand or body towels I was told that there were none. I stated that I had one the day before and was told because of theft, the number was limited. Lesson: bring your own or expect to use body towels for the length of your stay. The room smelled "stale" as though no one had stayed there for some time. I will say the restaurant was excellent and during the times the restaurant is not open, there is a local place across the street with good food as well as the town center. Beach is a 5 - 10 walk away and is fantastic! The party room (on the top floor) was great for the wedding and the package my friend got for the wedding was very good (included decorations, a team of people to decorate, hair and makeup for bride and wedding party, food package, honeymoon suite for bride/groom and band). I stayed here for two nights. I wanted to stay at the Aquarius a block or two down the road (and closer to the beach), but thought it would be rude to my friend to stay away from the rest of the wedding party. Overall, the hotel appeared to be clean, and with a little TLC, would feel clean. If you don't plan on spending much time in a hotel room, this place will do for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Sleeping in a frat House”
Reviews.Author: PaduaSanJuan
Reviews.Content: I rented two rooms for my whole family and we could not sleep for the whole weekend. It was like spending a weekend at a frat house. College kids were drinking,screaming, swearing running through the corridor and stairs. I called the front desk thr first night and they did not do anything. The screaming, swearing and running went on until 5am. The next night, the same thing. I called the fonrt desk again. The young man attending the front desks could not control the situation. There was no manager. The front desk clerk had instructions not to wake him up. He refused to call the police. We could not sleep. The next morning still no mananger. Another employee took my complaint and told me they would call me. I have not heard from the hotel. The whole experience was a nightmare!!!!!! A pity because the rooms are clean and comfortable. Before I forget, DO NOT choose the meal inclusive package. Continental breakfast is: whole milk(no 2% or skim), orange juice, frosted flakes or cheerios,white bread only,coffee(no decaf), bannanas and pinneapples if you are lucky. For dinner, the restaurant was almost empty and both nights we had to wait for 2 hours for the food, even though it was a fixed menu. TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fun Vacation Weekend”
Reviews.Author: Quelita
Reviews.Content: Great value for a weekend stay in Puerto Rico West Side!!! The room was a little small, with no view. Saw the ones that had a view, but it wasn't a big deal. The room was comfortable, had a little trouble managing the air conditioning (either too cold, or couldn't get it on once I turned it off). The room was clean and had a mini refrigerator (which was cool). The restaurant food was excellent and it was included in the special offer. The continental breakfast was ok. My husband and I personally went to the supermarket and bought some munchies for breakfast and to munch during the day. The pool was nice, eventhough the employees at the pool we not very pleasing. Overall experience was nice.

Reviews.Title: “Just Fine”
Reviews.Author: afjoe1
Reviews.Content: It is a good hotel for a one or two night stay. Staff is friendly. Beds were ok. Room was a little small. No hot water in the shower.Burrr! Very close to the main village and beach. Would recommend to young adults and couples that don't spend too much time in their rooms. It was clean. Good for the price. I would stay there again for a short stay.

Reviews.Title: “In need of alot of tender loving care !!”
Reviews.Author: titomalu
Reviews.Content: My and my wife stayed at this hotel in October 2007. When we arrived we were assigned our room in the fourth floor. The room was extremely dirty. Walls were stained and the bathroom floor was horrible. We requested a move and where switched to another room which although better was still subpar. We traveled with our neighbors to the hotel, they also requested a room change. It appears the hotel has been sold to a new owner and they are in the process of fixing it. I would never stay there again. I did not like it one bit.

Reviews.Title: “Camping Indoors”
Reviews.Author: coffeemr
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Puerto Rico for our second anniversary so this review is without bias. We arrived on Thursday, August 30 and left Sunday, Sept. 2. Here is one description of the Hotel. If you are looking for a place to shower and lay down, this might be your place. However, at $95 a night, I have stayed in better. There were many items which could be modified for this review to be better and I have listed a few below: As we arrived into our room, the air was not on so we entered into a sauna. As you can imagine, the temperature was a healthy 90ish or more. In addition, the refrigerator was not plugged in when we arrived so any beverages we had stayed hot. There was also no toilet tissue in the bathroom. Luckliy we had our own wipes :-) There was no remote control for the TV in the room which caused a major inconvenience (we had to call to receive both toilet tissue and a remote). The curtains on the windows were paper thin and you cold see through them. Lastly, there was no hot water in the shower. If there was, I didin't get any. Again, if you like to rough it, this might be your place. Not mine for a second annivesary trip. The beach was within walking distance which was very convenient. The people at the Hotel were great! They spoke both english and spanish. We even got to eat a local delicacy called quinepas which I had not tasted since I was a little boy in Panama! Overall, the people at the Hotel were great. They were able to steer us in the right direction for food and etc.. I just believe the lack of direction and leadership from the Hotel management is the downfall. This one gets a "Next" on the scale of staying here again or not.

Reviews.Title: “Major Disappointment”
Reviews.Author: maospsyche
Reviews.Content: Terrible management. On the last weekend of July of 2007 my spouse and I travel from TX and spent 3 days of our our 10 day vacation in PR in this hotel. The only bad part of our vacation. It was a complete disapointment. In terms of cleanliness we had no problems what so ever, it is close enough for a good walk to the beach. Enough with the good stuff: The registration was ridiculous, we arrived early and had to wait for almost 2 hrs in a line outside the hotel in order to check-in. We had to pay in advance our stay (not a confirmation of credit card). The beds were worst than the beds in boot camp in the Navy. Not all the lights fixtures worked, but one did. We complaint no one ever came to fixed it. The fridge was not working, complaint again and we figured out ourselves how to make it work. Management never fixed it. NOISY, NOISY, NOISY. The elevator was not working either. Thanks God it was only a third floor. A Special party on a Sunday morning 1:45AM. YES, 1:45AM without previous notice... We complaint about the noise in the party in the pool area, as PR law has restrictions of noise after midnight. The Admin said they could not lowered the volume because the management authorized the party. We asked for the management at 2:00am and the manager walked by and ignored our request to talked with us and said no matter what you request we will not lower the volume or end the party. We called the police who thanks God were able to end the party at 4:00am. Our money was not refunded. There are other better places to stay in the area. I was born in PR and live in the US and will never return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Not on the beach”
Reviews.Author: usmarineaviator
Reviews.Content: The A/C caught on fire 2 min after we turned it on in the first room we stayed in. The pool and jacuzzi were not filled with water. The beach is a 5-10 min walk away. This was a very family oriented hotel with either loud children or thin walls. The views from the balcony were not that nice. On a good note, the location is actually not that bad since it is half way from the beach and half way from the town center. I would recommend spending the day in Combate beach and the night in Boqueron.
